SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into USER_FILE (USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID,
DELETE_TIME, COMMENT) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from USER_FILE where USER_ID = #{param1,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STATE=#{param2,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select UPLOAD_ID, USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, FILE_LASTMODIFIED, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT from USER_FILE where USER_ID = #{param1,jdbcType=INTEGER} and FILE_ID = #{param2,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into USER_FILE (USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, FILE_LASTMODIFIED, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileLastmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update USER_FILE set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FILE_LASTMODIFIED = #{fileLastmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UPLOAD_ID, USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, FILE_LASTMODIFIED, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT from USER_FILE where UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select UPLOAD_ID, USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, FILE_LASTMODIFIED, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT from USER_FILE
